analysis.description:
WisePlatSale.WisePlatSale (/unique_chucks/1/0xe769d988ceda1559aee07963e59e62bd730dbba6.sol#319-332) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(devWallet,tokensDevelopers) (/unique_chucks/1/0xe769d988ceda1559aee07963e59e62bd730dbba6.sol#323-324)
	-token.mint(proWallet,tokensPromotion) (/unique_chucks/1/0xe769d988ceda1559aee07963e59e62bd730dbba6.sol#324-325)
	-token.mint(bountyWallet,tokensBounty) (/unique_chucks/1/0xe769d988ceda1559aee07963e59e62bd730dbba6.sol#325-326)

WisePlatSale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/1/0xe769d988ceda1559aee07963e59e62bd730dbba6.sol#355-372) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_chucks/1/0xe769d988ceda1559aee07963e59e62bd730dbba6.sol#368-370)

WisePlatSale.claimTokens4mBTC (/unique_chucks/1/0xe769d988ceda1559aee07963e59e62bd730dbba6.sol#373-404) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_chucks/1/0xe769d988ceda1559aee07963e59e62bd730dbba6.sol#395-396)

WisePlatSale.finishMinting (/unique_chucks/1/0xe769d988ceda1559aee07963e59e62bd730dbba6.sol#417-428) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(remainderWallet,tokensRemainder) (/unique_chucks/1/0xe769d988ceda1559aee07963e59e62bd730dbba6.sol#425-426)
	-token.finishMinting() (/unique_chucks/1/0xe769d988ceda1559aee07963e59e62bd730dbba6.sol#426-427)

WisePlatSale.reclaimToken (/unique_chucks/1/0xe769d988ceda1559aee07963e59e62bd730dbba6.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-tokenInst.transfer(msg.sender,balance) (/unique_chucks/1/0xe769d988ceda1559aee07963e59e62bd730dbba6.sol)

Reentrancy in WisePlatSale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/1/0xe769d988ceda1559aee07963e59e62bd730dbba6.sol#355-372):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(token.totalSupply().add(tokens) <= tokensTotal) (/unique_chucks/1/0xe769d988ceda1559aee07963e59e62bd730dbba6.sol#366)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- weiRaised (/unique_chucks/1/0xe769d988ceda1559aee07963e59e62bd730dbba6.sol#367-368)

Reentrancy in WisePlatSale.claimTokens4mBTC (/unique_chucks/1/0xe769d988ceda1559aee07963e59e62bd730dbba6.sol#373-404):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(token.totalSupply().add(tokens) <= tokensTotal) (/unique_chucks/1/0xe769d988ceda1559aee07963e59e62bd730dbba6.sol#389-390)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- weiRaised (/unique_chucks/1/0xe769d988ceda1559aee07963e59e62bd730dbba6.sol#392-395)

Reentrancy in WisePlatSale.finishMinting (/unique_chucks/1/0xe769d988ceda1559aee07963e59e62bd730dbba6.sol#417-428):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(hasEnded()) (/unique_chucks/1/0xe769d988ceda1559aee07963e59e62bd730dbba6.sol#422)
	- issuedTokenSupply = token.totalSupply() (/unique_chucks/1/0xe769d988ceda1559aee07963e59e62bd730dbba6.sol#422-423)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- tokensRemainder (/unique_chucks/1/0xe769d988ceda1559aee07963e59e62bd730dbba6.sol#423-425)

WisePlat.decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/1/0xe769d988ceda1559aee07963e59e62bd730dbba6.sol#228)
WisePlat.name should be constant (/unique_chucks/1/0xe769d988ceda1559aee07963e59e62bd730dbba6.sol#225-226)
WisePlat.symbol should be constant (/unique_chucks/1/0xe769d988ceda1559aee07963e59e62bd730dbba6.sol#227)
